summary: Bucky, talking to some Gen Z Wakandan kids before he went into his new cryo chamber: So this Zemo guy goes and blows up this...
body:
Captain America Civil War (Deleted End Credit Scene)

Bucky, talking to some Gen Z Wakandan kids before he went into his new cryo chamber: So this Zemo guy goes and blows up this building and I saw something about it and I’m thinking ‘maybe this catastrophic event won’t have to do with me"

reblog.comment:
Captain America Civil War (Deleted End Credit Scene)

Bucky, talking to some Gen Z Wakandan kids before he went into his new cryo chamber: So this Zemo guy goes and blows up this building and I saw something about it and I’m thinking ‘maybe this catastrophic event won’t have to do with me"

trail.content_raw:
Captain America Civil War (Deleted End Credit Scene)

Bucky, talking to some Gen Z Wakandan kids before he went into his new cryo chamber: So this Zemo guy goes and blows up this building and I saw something about it and I’m thinking ‘maybe this catastrophic event won’t have to do with me"
trail.content:
Captain America Civil War (Deleted End Credit Scene)

Bucky, talking to some Gen Z Wakandan kids before he went into his new cryo chamber: So this Zemo guy goes and blows up this building and I saw something about it and I’m thinking ‘maybe this catastrophic event won’t have to do with me"

blog.name: only-johnny-depp
blog.title: ☠ Johnny Depp ☠
blog.description: John became famous for part of the cast of the television series 21 Jump Street, since then he is a very successful, a great actor, musician and producer, known for playing eccentric characters. ♥ We're with you, always! ♥

summary: NEVER FORGET! THERE’S ONLY ONE MAN WHO CAN PLAY CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW! JOHNNY DEPP! On the past days the “Avenge the Fallen”...
caption:
NEVER FORGET!
THERE’S ONLY ONE MAN WHO CAN PLAY CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW! JOHNNY DEPP!

On the past days the “Avenge the Fallen” sentence from the upcoming “Avengers: Endgame” became a hit with many people posting memes about it. I made two posters, but this one is to remember that while in the movies Captain Jack Sparrow always escapes from trouble, in real life, Johnny, since the beginning, had to fight for his character. We all know that Johnny is the one who gave such personality for this beloved character between fans, and even himself, but behind the scenes, the Disney executives almost fired him when he first demonstrated how Captain Jack Sparrow would be in the movie, little they knew that the character became one of the most famous characters on cinema.

11 years later, everybody was caught by surprise when was announced that Disney was planning a reboot for the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, WITHOUT Johnny. Some time later was revealed Johnny had been fired and this month was revealed that a certain “gold digger” was behind it. Do not forget that he was dropped from his role as Captain Jack Sparrow, days after Ms. Heard published her piece in the Washington Post in 2018 talking about the “alleged domestic abuse”. She destroyed his, and a fan favorite character. 

Up until now, it’s unknown what the future holds for the character and franchise, but we cannot accept what happened. We cannot let Captain Jack Sparrow and the whole franchise sink.  WE HAVE TO AVENGE THE FALLEN!

Johnny saved us with this character, and now, we can also save the character too. Show your support showing our thoughts on social media, and also there’s a petition online to keep Johnny as Captain Jack Sparrow, where more than 8.000 sailors already joined the ship.

Make your voice be heard, savvy? and never forget:

“ - I’m Captain Jack Sparrow! The original! The only!”

summary: Avengers: Endgame's Rocket Raccoon Foreign Voice Actor SPOILS HUGE Plot Point!
title: Avengers: Endgame's Rocket Raccoon Foreign Voice Actor SPOILS HUGE Plot Point!
body:
Avengers: Endgame’s Rocket Raccoon Foreign Voice Actor SPOILS HUGE Plot Point!

Avengers: Endgame foreign voice actor Sergio Zurita, who voices Rocket Raccoon, spoiled a huge plot point for the upcoming movie.

**Warning Potential Spoilers for Avengers: Endgame Below**

As reported by ComicBookMovie.com, Zurita revealed at least one characters dies in the movie.

“I can tell you that the movie takes you from laughter to tears. A key character dies. I can not say more, it’s…

title: NUEVOS DETALLES EN PÓSTER DE AVENGERS: ENDGAME DE CHINA #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #Marvel #AvengersEndgame
body:
Los fans del Marvel Cinematic Universe ya cuentan los días para el estreno de Avengers: Endgame, cinta que marcará el cierre de la llamada Infinity Saga en el cine. Apenas ayer se dieron a conocer 32 nuevos pósters de cada personaje importante que ha estado presente en el MCU y ahora surgen nuevos detalles con un póster que llega desde China.

Lo primero que se puede apreciar, es que a…

summary: New Avengers: Endgame Chinese Posters Hints at the Return of Fallen Avengers!
title: New Avengers: Endgame Chinese Posters Hints at the Return of Fallen Avengers!
body:
New Avengers: Endgame Chinese Posters Hints at the Return of Fallen Avengers!

A brand new Avnegers: Endgame Chinese poster hints at the return of a number of fallen Avengers who were snapped out of existence by the Mad Titan Thanos.

Check it out.

The poster shows Thanos looming above all of the Avengers, who are currently alive. Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye, and Black Widow, and Hulk, the original six Avengers, are in the center of the poster. They are flanked…

summary: Una valanga di foto ufficiali da Avengers: Endgame
title: Una valanga di foto ufficiali da Avengers: Endgame
body:
Una valanga di foto ufficiali da Avengers: Endgame

Continua la campagna promozionale Marvel Studios in vista dell’uscita in sala di Avengers: Endgame.

Quest’oggi possiamo godere della visione di una speciale galleria fotografica. Le immagini in questione mostrano alcuni dei fotografi più rappresentativi già ammirati nel trailer rilasciato nei giorni scorsi.

Avete già visto i 32 characters poster? Fatelo qui.

Avengers: Endgame sarà…

summary: All I'm saying is Marvel won't be the same for me once we lose Stevie.
body:
All I’m saying is Marvel won’t be the same for me once we lose Stevie.

That’s my opinion!! For me Steve Rogers shaped Marvel. Don’t fight me on this, it’s my opinion!! Oh god I am going to miss Cap 😭😭💔💔💔

Love you, Cap!! ❤❤❤

summary: This is the official Chinese poster for Endgame. What I find super interesting is the silhouettes of the previously-snapped...
body: This is the official Chinese poster for Endgame. What I find super interesting is the silhouettes of the previously-snapped included at the bottom (including yes, Bucky and Shuri, on the bottom left sides). Would be badass if they all just re-appeared from the snap in this exact formation (and led by Nick Fury no less) lolol

reblog.comment: This is the official Chinese poster for Endgame. What I find super interesting is the silhouettes of the previously-snapped included at the bottom (including yes, Bucky and Shuri, on the bottom left sides). Would be badass if they all just re-appeared from the snap in this exact formation (and led by Nick Fury no less) lolol

Would be badass if they all just re-appeared from the snap in this exact formation (and led by Nick Fury no less) lolol

title: SNN #243 – Capitã Marvel #OPodcastÉDelas2019
body:
Guerreiros, em guarda! SNN #243 – Capitã Marvel #OPodcastÉDelas2019

Guerreiros, em guarda!

Nesta missão, Marcos Moreira (@marvincosmo), Thais Freitas (@ThaisdF17), Clarisse Machado (@clamlemos) e Fábio Moreira (@facosmo) convidam a Fabiana Murray (@fabianamurray), do Pílulas de Beleza, e a Thata Finotto (@thata_finotto), do PQPCast, para falar do primeiro filme do MCU com uma heroína feminina, e todas as polêmicas envolvendo as mensagens que essa aventura traz!
